body: Introduction to microcontrollers in electronic and electromechanical systems. Hardware and software design for user/system interfaces, data acquisition, and control.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC201 or CMPSC121 ; CMPEN271; Concurrent: E E 310)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
contentHtml: Introduction to microcontrollers in electronic and electromechanical systems. Hardware and software design for user/system interfaces, data acquisition, and control.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC201 or CMPSC121 ; CMPEN271; Concurrent: E E 310)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
title: EE 316: Introduction to Embedded Microcontrollers
